    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static DefaultPlayground read(String name,
                     InputStream s)
                              throws IOException
        Build the playground from an input stream. Each line in that stream represents one row on the playground. Each '#' in that line represents a wall node, ' ' represents a node where the worm can move and any other character represents a possible starting position for a worm. (Starting positions also can be moved into.)
        Parameters:
        name - Name for the new playground.
        s - Stream in question.
        Returns:
        Playground constructed from that stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - In case the stream cannot be read.

      • write

        public void write(OutputStream s)
           throws IOException
        Write out the playground into a stream, according to the spec described in #read(InputStream).
        Parameters:
        s - The stream
        Throws:
        IOException - In case the stream cannot be written.
